#BlackMagicCraft #Episode080

This episode I discuss some of the important steps you should take when preparing miniatures for painting. I will cover mold lines, how to remove mold lines, pinning and gluing parts, and gap filling using both green stuff and the old baking soda and super glue trick.

BUY TOOLS & SUPPLIES TO PREP YOUR MINIS:
